statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"last_name":"Weaver","id":2,"avatar":"https://reqres.in/img/faces/2-image.jpg","first_name":"PutUser","email":"janet.weaver@reqres.in"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/josn", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
